name.japanese: 海上レストラン バラティエ

description: A floating restaurant ship in the East Blue, owned and operated by former pirate Red-Leg Zeff. The ship serves as the primary battleground for the Luffy vs. Krieg fight.

keyEvents.title: Gin's Sacrifice
keyEvents.description: Gin gives his gas mask to Luffy on the deck of the Baratie, saving Luffy from the MH5 poison gas.

keyEvents.title: Luffy vs Krieg Intensifies
keyEvents.description: The climactic battle between Luffy and Don Krieg takes place on and around the Baratie.

keyEvents.title: Baratie Staff Cares for Gin
keyEvents.description: The Baratie staff provides medical care to the poisoned Gin despite him being an enemy pirate.

statusHistory.description: Operating as a restaurant while under siege by the Krieg Pirates

culturalSignificance: The Baratie represents the values of compassion and feeding those in need, regardless of their status as friend or foe. It serves as an important location for Sanji's character development and the theme that kindness can change people.
